summary: This is a memorandum from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) documenting a voluntary interview conducted on March 16, 2022, with a Federal Bureau of Prisons Lieutenant from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. The interview is part of the OIG's investigation into the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein in August 2019. The memorandum lists several attachments, including the interview transcript and related prison records.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the OIG death investigation. He was housed at MCC New York in July and August 2019 under register number 76318-054.

persons.name: Lieutenant
persons.context: A BOP Lieutenant from MCC New York's Office of Special Investigative Services who was interviewed voluntarily by the OIG regarding the circumstances surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Assistant Special Agent in Charge
persons.role: OIG Assistant Special Agent in Charge
persons.context: An OIG official who, along with a Special Agent, conducted the interview of the BOP Lieutenant on March 16, 2022.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: An OIG official who, along with the Assistant Special Agent in Charge, conducted the interview of the BOP Lieutenant on March 16, 2022.

connections.description: The Lieutenant was a staff member at MCC New York when Epstein was housed there as an inmate in July and August 2019.
The OIG Assistant Special Agent in Charge interviewed the BOP Lieutenant as part of the official investigation into Epstein's death.
The OIG Special Agent interviewed the BOP Lieutenant as part of the official investigation into Epstein's death.

events.title: OIG Interview of BOP Lieutenant
events.description: Assistant Special Agent in Charge and Special Agent from the DOJ OIG conducted a voluntary, recorded interview of a BOP Lieutenant from MCC New York regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Epstein Death Investigation at MCC
events.description: Pictures were taken at MCC New York in association with the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death. Other records from this date include a phone call record, an inmate transfer receipt, and a SHU inmate roster.

events.title: Epstein Housed at MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was housed at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York during July and August 2019.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York
Metropolitan Detention Center, Brooklyn, New York
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General (OIG) is conducting an official investigation into the death of Federal Bureau of Prisons inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
A BOP Lieutenant from MCC New York's Special Investigative Services office was interviewed in March 2022 regarding Epstein's time in custody in July/August 2019.
The memorandum references several key documents from August 9, 2019, including a phone call record, inmate transfer receipt, SHU roster, and investigation pictures, all related to Epstein's death.
The interview was voluntary, recorded, and transcribed, with the recording saved separately due to its large file size.
